author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Pazhavoor police have arrested a man for allegedly murdering his wife.

Police said Ponkumar (42) of Nambithoppu near Thirukkurunkudi and his wife Rajeshwari (37) were working in a poultry farm at Chidambarapuram near Pazhavoor and were living in a house on the farm.

Since Ponkumar, an alcoholic, suspected his wife’s fidelity, he used to pick up quarrel with her everyday. When an altercation broke out between the couple on Thursday night, Ponkumar crushed Rajeshwari’s head with a boulder, in which the woman, a mother of two boys, died on the spot.
title: Man held for killing wife
